text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.3.2074.1.1.3
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1021.103

name: OmbRaceCategories
title: OMB Race Categories
description: The codes for the concepts 'Unknown', 'Asked but no answer', 'other, and the codes for the five race categories - 'American Indian' or 'Alaska Native', 'Asian', 'Black or African American', 'Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander', and 'White' - as defined by the [OMB Standards for Maintaining, Collecting, and Presenting Federal Data on Race and Ethnicity, Statistical Policy Directive No. 15, as revised, October 30, 1997](https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-1997-10-30/pdf/97-28653.pdf) .
